channel.title: CCNP SP on Networknoob
channel.description: Recent content in CCNP SP on Networknoob

item.title: CCNP SPCOR - Automation and Assurance
item.description: 5.0 Automation and Assurance The automation and assurance topics section is 15% of the overall exam, the topics and associated study materials I am using/collecting is below. 5.1 Describe the programmable APIs used to include Cisco devices in network automation Blog: denetdan.com - NETCONF Vs. RESTCONF RFC 8040: RESTCONF Protocol RFC 6241: Network Configuration Protocol (NETCONF) 5.2 Interpret an external script to configure a Cisco device using a REST API Cisco Documentation: Cisco IOS XE REST API Management Reference Guide

item.title: CCNP SPCOR - Services
item.description: 4.0 Services The Services topics section is 20% of the overall exam, the topics and associated study materials I am using/collecting is below. 4.1 Describe VPN services 4.1.a EVPN Cisco Documentation: EVPN Features IOS-XR Cisco SP360 Blog: Ethernet VPN – What’s the big deal about it? 4.1.b Inter-AS VPN Cisco Documentation: MPLS VPN–Inter-AS Option AB Blog: orhanergun.net/Inter AS Option A Design Considerations and Comparison Book: MPLS and VPN Architectures CCIP Edition

item.title: CCNP SPCOR - MPLS and Segment Routing
item.description: 3.0 MPLS and Segment Routing The MPLS and Segment Routing topics section is 20% of the overall exam, the topics and associated study materials I am using/collecting is below. 3.1 Implement MPLS Cisco Documentation: Implementing MPLS Label Distribution Protocol - IOS-XR 3.1.a LDP sync Cisco Documentation: MPLS LDP-IGP Synchronization - IOS-XE Cisco Documentation: Configuring LDP IGP Synchronization: OSPF - IOS-XR 3.1.b LDP session protection Cisco Documentation: MPLS LDP Session Protection - IOS-XE

item.title: CCNP SPCOR - Networking
item.description: 2.0 Networking Topics The Networking topics section is 30% of the overall exam, the topics and associated study materials I am using/collecting is below. 2.1 Implement IS-IS (IPv6 and IPv6) Book: Routing TCP/IP Volume 1 Chapter 10, Page 574 - Case Study: A basic IPv4 IS-IS Configuration Chapter 10, Page 591 - Case Study: A basic IPv6 IS-IS Configuration Cisco Documentation: Implementing IS-IS on Cisco IOS XR Software

item.title: CCNP SPCOR - Architecture
item.description: 1.0 Architecture Topics The Architecture topics section is 15% of the overall exam, the topics and associated study materials I am using/collecting is below. Its difficult to know how deep to go into these topics, we can an idea from the section percentage at 15% I would not expect expert deep dive knowledge on each topic, but perhaps a good introduction and overview of the technologies and how, where and in which situation they would be expected to be used.

item.title: CCNP Service Provider
item.description: CCNP 350-501 SPCOR I am starting study for the 350-501 SPCOR exam to recertify my CCNP Enterprise (R&S). As part of this I am going to blog the exam topics and materials I am using as there is no official certificate guide for this exam. Each page focuses on a section from the exam topics/blueprint and the corresponding materials (books, blogs, cisco documentation etc) that I am going to use for study.
